full_description:
Oryx Storm Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Oryx Storm Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch offers durability in a variety of conditions with an amazing IP67 water-resistant rating. The antistatic silicone band and mix of ABS and PC were used in the creation of this smartwatch, which provides comfort and durability. Vibrant graphics are displayed on its 1.39-inch TFT LCD screen, which has a resolution of 360 by 360 pixels. Full-screen touch functionality with full lamination allows for seamless interaction. The RTL8763EWE chipset, along with an external 128Mb memory, and the Oryx Storm Smartwatch's 578KB of RAM assure seamless operation. The Bluetooth 5.2 protocol guarantees effective connectivity, while the Silan MicroSC7A2O G-Sensor adds functionality. The Oryx Storm Smartwatch, which has MobileAPP-GPS, is a trustworthy navigational ally. A vibrator and the HX3600 heart rate sensor are two elements for health monitoring. With a Seiko plate protecting it, the 230mAh polymer battery has a potential standby life of 10–15 days and a typical usage life of 5–7 days. The Oryx Storm Smartwatch is a versatile and dependable companion for anyone looking for a high-performance wearable, as it smoothly integrates into a variety of smart ecosystems thanks to its support for both Android (5.0 and above) and Apple iOS (9.0 and above).

full_description:
Oryx Hype Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Oryx Hype Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch is a multifunctional, long-lasting wearable designed to enhance daily activities. This Oryx smartwatch boasts an IP67 water-resistant rating, guaranteeing dependability under harsh conditions. It is made of a zinc alloy, ABS plastic, PC casing, and antistatic silicone strap, which balances durability and comfort. With a 2.0 square inch TFT LCD screen and 240*296 pixel resolution, the Oryx Hype Smartwatch provides crisp images for an improved user experience. A seamless touch interface is added with the full-screen touch panel that has full lamination. This smartwatch offers seamless performance thanks to its RTL8763EWE processor, which has 578KB of RAM and 128MB of external memory. The G-Sensor's functionality is improved by using Silan Micro SC7A2O technology. Although MobileAPP-GPS is included, Bluetooth 5.2 guarantees effective connectivity and navigational features. Features for health monitoring include a vibrator and the HX3600 heart rate sensor. With a 230mAh capacity and a potential standby time of 10-15 days, the polymer battery, protected by a Seiko plate, may last for an average of 5-7 days. The Oryx Hype Smartwatch is compatible with Android (5.0 and above) and Apple iOS (9.0 and above). It is a versatile and dependable companion for your busy lifestyle, seamlessly integrating into many smart ecosystems.

full_description:
Oryx BOLT Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch

The Oryx BOLT Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch has a variety of tasks and features to improve your living. It features an AMOLED 1.43-inch screen, a standard detachable 22mm band, and a variety of customizable watch faces. The Oryx BOLT Smartwatch allows you to monitor the weather, listen to Bluetooth music, and make and receive calls. Using measurements of your heart rate, blood pressure, blood oxygen, calories burned, distance traveled, sleep duration and quality, and other factors, the Smartwatch also keeps an eye on your overall health and fitness. To monitor your progress and establish objectives, you can select from a variety of sports modes. Along with clock alarms, a remote camera, and sedentary reminders, the Oryx BOLT Smartwatch also lets you know when you have incoming calls, SMS messages, and other notifications. English, Chinese, Japanese, German, French, Spanish, Arabic, Russian, Ukrainian, and Portuguese are all supported languages on the Oryx Smartwatch. With its large 360mAh battery, the Oryx watch can run on standby for around 15 days and on regular use for 3–5 days. The Smartwatch can synchronize data to APK/APP and is compatible with iOS 8.0 and Android 4.4 or later versions. A BLE 5.0 Bluetooth connection, a Realtek8763EWE-VP chipset, flash 128MB RAM, a 466*466 LCD resolution, a 3605 heart rate sensor, a 0916 speaker, and an integrated vibrator are all features of the Oryx BOLT Bluetooth Calling Smartwatch.
